org.jasig.cas.monitor

Interface Monitor<S extends Status>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the generic type of the monitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCacheMonitor, AbstractNamedMonitor, AbstractPoolMonitor, DataSourceMonitor, EhCacheMonitor, HealthCheckMonitor, MemcachedMonitor, MemoryMonitor, PooledConnectionFactoryMonitor, SessionMonitor

    public interface Monitor<S extends Status>
    A monitor observes a resource and reports its status.
    Since:
    3.5.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the monitor.
      S observe()
      Observes the monitored resource and reports the status.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the monitor.
        Returns:
        Monitor name.

      • observe

        S observe()
        Observes the monitored resource and reports the status.
        Returns:
        Status of monitored resource.
